lead_paragraph: Prosecutors asked a French court yesterday to acquit the British cyclist David Millar in a doping trial involving several current and former riders for the Cofidis team. Millar was barred for two years and stripped of his 2003 world time-trial title after admitting to a French judge that he used EPO.
